EV isolated method: EVs were pelleted from Cavitron ultrasonic surgical aspirate (CUSA) fluid by ultracentrifugation (100,000× g, 16 h, 4 °C, SW41 Ti/45 Ti, Beckman Coulter L80XP) and washed with sterile-filtered ice-cold PBS (100,000× g, 2 h, 4 °C). Crude CUSA-EV pellets were resuspended in PBS, the protein content estimated by Qubit®2.0 fluorometric quantitation and aliquots stored at −80 °C.
